title: Summoner Icons in-store won't let you purchase them
body:
These two summoner icons are in the store but they don't have a price and the unlock button doesn't unlock them
they don't look like the Ghost/battlecast poro icons that we get when the snowdown starts, so are these two meant to be available now and aren't 
or are they not meant to be available and are in store as a bug?

replies.body: Yup HeartVine is correct. They have now been removed, thank you for bring it to my attention.
Thanks i appreciate it, looking forward to when they are available  :P

> [{quoted}](name=Riot ToxicHawk,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=N1jk3ekT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-15T05:27:55.280+0000)
> Yup HeartVine is correct.

Poro King confirmed for 16th?
It's because they shouldn't be in the store yet. They're icons for the 'Legend Of The Poro King' game mode, which will probably be released on the 16th with Snowdown.

Ah ok i thought that was the case, but just wanted to make sure incase.
thanks
